TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WebPartAuthorizationEventHandler(object sender, WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WebPartAuthorizationEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WebPartAuthorizationEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs)
public delegate void WebPartAuthorizationEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示處理 物件之 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 組件控制項加入至 Web 組件區域前，就會引發事件。The event is raised before a Web Parts control is added to a Web Parts zone. 您可以指定控制項可以藉由自訂事件處理的方式新增至區域的 Web 組件。You can specify which Web Parts controls can be added to a zone by customizing how the event is handled. 中指定的方法委派時，會呼叫就會引發事件。The method specified in the delegate is called when an event is raised. 網頁開發人員可以提供的自訂處理常式 Web 組件事件加`OnAuthorizeWebPart`屬性``項目 頁面上，指定給該屬性的自訂方法名稱。Page developers can provide custom handlers for Web Parts events by adding an `OnAuthorizeWebPart` attribute to the `` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute. 自訂處理常式也可以指派以程式設計的方式。A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically. 如需有關以程式設計的方式指派的事件處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 如何： 連接事件處理常式方法的事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc)。For more information on programmatically assigning an event handler, see [NIB: How to: Connect Event Handler Methods to Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
